de.javasoft.swing.sort
Interface ISortController<M>

All Superinterfaces:
org.jdesktop.swingx.sort.SortController<M>
All Known Implementing Classes:
JYTableSortController
public interface ISortController<M>
extends org.jdesktop.swingx.sort.SortController<M>

Extended SortController which supports multi-sorts.

          Returns the number of sorted columns.

Method Detail

toggleSortOrder

void toggleSortOrder(int columnIndex,
                     boolean isMultipleSort)
Toggles the SortOrder of the given column in either single-sort or multiple-sort modus, depending on the boolean flag.

Implementations must respect the per-controller and per-column sortable property.

Parameters:
columnIndex - the column in model coordinates
isMultipleSort - a boolean indicating sort modus, true denotes mult-sort, false denotes single-sort

getSortIndex

int getSortIndex(int columnIndex)
Returns the sort index of the column. That is, its position in the list of sort keys, if contained and sorted, or -1 if not.

Parameters:
columnIndex - the column in model coordinates
Returns:
the sort index, that is the position in the list of sort keys if contained and sorted or -1 if not

getSortCount

int getSortCount()
Returns the number of sorted columns.

Returns:
the number of sorted columns.
